Issue.creator: arman19940326
Issue.description: Since the fabric-client package has been removed from the node SDK as of version 2.0, is there a way to do administrative tasks such as creating channels, joining peers, updating anchor peers, ... without CLI? I'm still using fabric-client v1.4 with HLF v2.2. I'm wondering if there's any way to do the aforementioned tasks without resorting to CLI.
